details.purpose: Specifies the description of the medication as part of an INSTRUCTION or ACTION recording taken with regard to medication. This will usually be in response to a medication order or prescription, but may be self administered or supplied by a pharmacy.
details.use: For use with INSTRUCTION.medication and ACTION.medication to describe the medication

items.items: The description of a medication for recording as part of an ACTION or INSTRUCTION
The name of the intervention - which may be coded
The time over which an individual dose is to be administered
The generic name of the drug which is an alternative name to the name of medication
The dose to be administered at one time
Dose, frequency, route & instruction as narrative.

Opis odmerka, pogostosti jemanja, načina in navodil v nestrukturirani obliki.
